page.title: 20OWLETTS FARM
page.content: Owletts is in the top right corner of our area and is 253 acres in size. It is mainly a beef farm though 20 acres are put aside for corn.The farm has 97 beef cattle of the Limousin Cross breed.There are 4 buildings on the farm, excluding the family home, specifically to house the cattle in winter. The grain produced on the farm is used as food during the winter- the sowing of seeds is the main Spring pre-occupation. As with any farmer, the owner of Owletts, Mr. Slater, considers the weather to be his main problem. The farm employs 2 men . .
